website_summaries.verdict: Plush material (like that on a stuffed animal) wraps this seat belt pillow. Fluffy and soft enough to cradle a child’s head just like a pillow.
pros: Attachment is simple and fast with Velcro/clip system
Easy care and machine washable, which is ideal considering how often it’s used
Packaged with bonus: a slip-free phone mat for your dashboard
cons: It’s only recommended for children old enough to wear regular seat belts, as young children must be secured in appropriate car seats

customer_reviews.title: I like these seatbelt cushions.
customer_reviews.text: Travel pillow with seat belt AMZ RACK are ideal for children to have a good nap or sleep comfortably in the car. They are made of a micro suede and stuffed with cotton that make them very comfortable. They are a good size and easy to install in the safety belts of your car. The set includes 2 seatbelt cushions and 2 red seatbelt clips.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very large and comfy...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this is extremely plush. About three or 4 inches thick when wrapped properly on the seatbelt. It’s a great alternative for kids that want a nice cushion or adults and you obviously don’t want to break the bank doing it. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good belt pillow. We got this so that it keeps the backseat tidier without small pillows being thrown around the car. The material is very soft and the cushion is pretty thick. It makes napping easier. This works very well with a seat belt adjuster, too.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Chau

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, she is using a booster so I want it something soft and comfortable for her while we are on the road, at the beginning I couldn’t figure out how to make it comfortable for her to use this pad but now is so easy, comfortable and I can remove it at bring it with me if I have to change vehicles. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, great for long drives
customer_reviews.text: The material the pillows are made of is very high quality, and super comfortable. The seller was very good, the order was delivered on time with no issues. My kids love the pillows for when we go on drives. Installation is super easy, and the seller even included a gift in the order! Would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzi

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It big enough that that she can use it to just sleep on like a pillow. She would always complain that the seatbelt was uncomfortable. I’m so glad that I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: dealfinderess

customer_reviews.title: Clips were missing.
customer_reviews.text: Clips were missing. I contacted the seller to see how I could get the clips. They never responded to me and just automatically issued a refund. Thumbs way down if you ask me. The covers seem very nice; very soft. Haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nords

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant! My only disappointment is that I didn't have them sooner! With three kids these things are a must, seriously. They are comfortable, fit nicely and allow my kids to fall asleep without asking for a sweater. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Rena Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold their head up
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. The pillow is soft but the red clip left scratches on my little girl. The pillow is suppose to keep her head up but it doesn’t. Don’t buy these. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for the little necks they'll be supporting on our roadtrips! Very soft, and conforming! The clips also keep them in place! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. It arrived quickly. The quality of the pillow is great and doesn't slide so holds a child's head. The item was as described. I would def purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son(10yrs) and he rests on it often. We are in the car a lot - I’ll save the second one for when my daughter is out of her car seat. One wish - The Orange larch is beyond uncomfortable. We don’t use it but wish we could. It presses against my son but if we don’t use it, it slides. We opt not to use it
customer_reviews.author: linda andal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, falls apart, kids won't even use them
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaply made and come apart. My daughter actually took the pillow out of the cover and uses it for her dolls. I would not recommend this for a seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Needs directions
customer_reviews.text: Well it would be nice if this came with some sort of directions. It is soft and plush for sure. You think it’s easy and then it comes with 3 additional pieces. What is the right way to install? How do you get the most comfort? What are all the extra pieces for? This will be returned with a negative review if I don’t get a response from the company soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what i needed. Have twins on boosters so when they tend to fall asleep the belt hurts them. This was a quick and easy solution. Happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Good size pillow.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't quite stay in place but it helps for the long rides and naps.i did have to see it after a week of use. The trim and Velcro started to unravel.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: comfort is essential
customer_reviews.text: Child shifting from major car seat to booster and these saved the day in terms of making certain that the seatbelt was comfortable over the shoulder and across the lap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a little bulky for sure. They fit fine but fatter then I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Luvmy5gkids

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This seatbelt pillow is in great quality, love the product. Also came with 2 seatbelt clips which is awesome. My kids love it and it make long journeys very fun.. 👪
customer_reviews.author: Siraj

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck support!
customer_reviews.text: This really does support your neck well I take long rides to vegas with family and hate sleeping due to my neck hurting after but with this my neck stops hurting when sleep in car.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: The quality far exceeds the price!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE THESE!!! Feels like mink unbelievably soft and squishy! I got them for my kids but now I’m definitely going to have to order two more for myself and hubby! The clips are fantastic and the water proof carry bag is more than I ever expected at this price point. I’m beyond impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Johanson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Helps with neck support when he doses off.
customer_reviews.author: Ash C

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for napping on long drives
customer_reviews.text: This pillow worked pretty well for my 4 year old on a recent long drive. I didn’t give five stars, because I think little more bulk might have been better. Also, it slipped down a little. Definitely helped him sleep though, compared to not having one.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Does what its suppose to
customer_reviews.text: I love thia item and my child does to. Does exactly what it says its suppose. When my child falls asleep his head staya back and leans againest this. I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Soft and has a good amount of padding but the red clip didn't keep it from slipping down so she just moves it up and down by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Sherratt

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pillow. Also very easy to put on seatbelt. Glad product arrived on time. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Afrah Abdi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Thanks! This product helps my daughter alot. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzson M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these for my son and daughter. So far so good. It’s light weight and soft. Let’s see how long it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: Ok soo

customer_reviews.title: Feels like pillows. Kids will love them
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot bigger than I thought they would be, which is a nice thing. My son is always complaining about the seatbelt rubbing his neck and these work get. They are so soft and is like a little pillow.
customer_reviews.author: ashley jurgensmeier

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Road Trips with Kids!
customer_reviews.text: These came in a two pack, which is perfect since we have two children (7 and 5). The seat belt cushions were easy to attach (just velcro) and really plush and comfortable. The kids were excited to nap on the road trip with them - and when does that ever happen?! They actually fell asleep on our way home, and their necks and heads were supported and didn't bob around. Definitely recommending these to all of my mom friends!
customer_reviews.author: lbarrybooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and handy!
customer_reviews.text: These are both awesome and Handy! From the picture i saw I thought these would be both small and thin. They are not! They are very big and very plushy! They stay well on the seat belt when clipped on properly! have an upcoming trip and am very excited to use these for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Johnson

customer_reviews.title: For neck support, use a car seat.
customer_reviews.text: This company should be put down. A thoughtful gift to parents of toddlers? Toddlers should NOT be using just a seat belt. If the shoulder strap is not sitting across the collar bone the child is too small. Just like the child depicted in the picture. Who offers a product that can become a life or death situation for a child? A small child?? Comfort means nothing if your kid is in a box 6 feet under. If you need something to support their neck because the strap is cutting into it then get them a correct car seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: These are REALLY soft and fluffy! Very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.A

customer_reviews.title: Good size, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are good for adults or children. Very soft and pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer37

product_meta.title: 2 Pcs Seatbelt Pillow Covers Pads - Seat belt Strap Cover for Kids Toddler & Adults - Soft Plush + 2 Red Clips - Safety Car Accessories for Shoulder Neck Support - Cotton Washable Headrest Gift
feature_bullets: YOUR KIDS WILL SLEEP LIKE ANGELS in your refreshing ride or the long car travel, with a 2-piece seatbelt cover for kids supporting their neck and shoulders. Soft, plush and SUPER comfy, AMZ RACK car head cushions will prevent sore neck. It is a Great Value set of 2 Seatbelt Cushions + 2 Red Seatbelt Clips.

THE MOST COMFORTABLE SEATBELT COVERS! It is the ergonomic design and the soft, breathable materials that make this child seatbelt pillow stand out. Filled with PP COTTON and covered with a soft micro-suede fabric, our car seat belt protector also comes with EXTRA cushion, to be comfier than similar pillows. And the handy velcro closure makes it easier to remove the kids’ seatbelt cover to clean it.

EASY TO USE, REMOVE & WASH! Designed in the perfect size of 30cm x 12cm x 6.35cm to provide best head support to your kids, these large seatbelt shoulder covers ensure snug fit on all types of vehicles. They will remain firmly put without sliding due to the 2 handy Red Clips. Plus, they will be removed in a breeze, to be tossed in the washing machine and remain fresh like brand new!

OFFER THE MOST THOUGHTFUL GIFT! Treat a loved parent of a toddler or young kid to a gift to remember! Offer them this PREMIUM car seat belt pad to save them the nagging of their children when nap time comes during their rides. Show off your excellent taste with the ultimate seatbelt cover offered as an unforgettable gift on all occasions!

GET THE BEST SEATBELT PILLOW OR YOUR MONEY BACK! At AMZ RACK, our customers’ complete satisfaction is paramount. This is why we back our kids’ seatbelt cover with 100% Money Back Guarantee & our friendly Customer Service, to help you buy with confidence. So, place your order in peace of mind, as you have nothing to lose!
